contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Willisville, Arkansas |settlement_type = [[Town]] |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_seal = |image_map = Nevada_County_Arkansas_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Willisville_Highlighted.svg |mapsize = 250px |map_caption = Location in [[Nevada County, Arkansas|Nevada County]] and the state of [[Arkansas]] |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Political divisions of the United States|State]] |subdivision_type2 = [[List of counties in Arkansas|County]] |subdivision_name = [[United States]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Arkansas]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Nevada County, Arkansas|Nevada]] |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 4.1 |area_total_sq_mi = 1.6 |area_land_km2 = 4.1 |area_land_sq_mi = 1.6 |area_water_km2 = 0 |area_water_sq_mi = 0 |elevation_ft = 361 |elevation_m = 110 |population_as_of = 2000 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 188 |population_metro = |population_density_km2 = 45.9 |population_density_sq_mi = 117.5 |timezone = [[North American Central Time Zone|Central (CST)]] |utc_offset = -6 |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_type = region:US_type:city |latd = 33 |latm = 30 |lats = 51 |latNS = N |longd = 93 |longm = 17 |longs = 44 |longEW = W |timezone_DST = CDT |utc_offset_DST = -5 |postal_code_type = [[ZIP code]] |postal_code = 71864 |area_code = [[Area code 870|870]] |blank_name = [[Federal Information Processing Standard|FIPS code]] |blank_info = 05-75770 |blank1_name = [[Geographic Names Information System|GNIS]] feature ID |blank1_info = 0056411 |footnotes = |website = }} '''Willisville''' is a town in [[Nevada County, Arkansas|Nevada County]], [[Arkansas]], [[United States]]. The population was 188 at the 2000 census. It is part of the [[Hope, Arkansas|Hope]] [[Hope micropolitan area|Micropolitan Statistical Area]]. ==Geography== Willisville is located at {{coord|33|30|51|N|93|17|44|W|type:city}} (33.514033, -93.295475){{GR|1}}. According to the [[United States Census Bureau]], the town has a total area of 4.1 km² (1.6 mi²), all land. ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 188 people, 76 households, and 57 families residing in the town. The [[population density]] was 45.4/km² (117.5/mi²). There were 85 housing units at an average density of 20.5/km² (53.1/mi²). The racial makeup of the town was 79.26% [[Race (United States Census)|White]], 19.15% [[Race (United States Census)|Black]] or [[Race (United States Census)|African American]], 1.06% [[Race (United States Census)|Native American]], and 0.53% from two or more races. 1.60% of the population were [[Race (United States Census)|Hispanic]] or [[Race (United States Census)|Latino]] of any race. There were 76 households out of which 30.3% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 65.8% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 10.5% had a female householder with no husband present, and 23.7% were non-families. 22.4% of all households were made up of individuals and 9.2% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.47 and the average family size was 2.88. In the town the population was spread out with 25.5% under the age of 18, 6.9% from 18 to 24, 22.9% from 25 to 44, 28.2% from 45 to 64, and 16.5% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 41 years. For every 100 females there were 102.2 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 97.2 males. The median income for a household in the town was $28,750, and the median income for a family was $36,250. Males had a median income of $36,875 versus $12,188 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the town was $12,925. About 13.8% of families and 21.3% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 31.1% of those under the age of eighteen and 5.9% of those sixty five or over. ==References== <references /> {{Nevada County, Arkansas}} [[Category:Populated places in Nevada County, Arkansas]] [[Category:Towns in Arkansas]] [[Category:Hope micropolitan area]]
